ThingDef.label: bondageBed
ThingDef.description: Bound prisoners on it to make sure that they can't make trouble for you.

ThingDef.label: advanced bondageBed
ThingDef.description: If your colonists need some hard way to weather the storm,this can help you. Please don't worry, it is very comfortable like a common bed.

ThingDef.label: electric chair
ThingDef.description: It is comfortable for Masochists. High voltage mode also can make prisoners die. \nIt need much power in running.Make sure you have enough power to run it.

ThingDef.label: simple bed
ThingDef.description: A makeshift bed, slightly uncomfortable but can save resources.

ThingDef.label: double nice bed
ThingDef.description: A beautiful bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: True Cross
ThingDef.description: Bound prisoners to it to make sure that they may can receive salvation.

ThingDef.label: Torture Cross
ThingDef.description: Bound prisoners to it to make them suffer.

ThingDef.label: Hanging Cage Left
ThingDef.description: Bound prisoners to it to make sure that they may can receive salvation.

ThingDef.label: Hanging Cage Right
ThingDef.description: Bound prisoners to it to make sure that they may can receive salvation.

ThingDef.label: Prisoner Pole
ThingDef.description: Bound prisoners to it to give them a whipping.

ThingDef.label: Pillory
ThingDef.description: Bound prisoners to it to make sure that they may can receive salvation.

ThingDef.label: Operating Bondage Table
ThingDef.description: Bound prisoners on it to make sure that they can't make trouble for you while harvesting their organs.

ThingDef.label: Beheading Block
ThingDef.description: Let them kneel for a last time.
